casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Michael Anthony GUERRERA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2016

Damian K. Gunningsmith, in support of the petition.

Jonathan M. Sousa, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 74, 142 A.3d 447 (2016), is denied.
